steps.summary: When approaching the jump, slightly bend your legs, putting pressure on the balls of your feet. Maintain this "coasting" position throughout the jump.

steps.summary: Keep your body stacked over the center of your snowboard when going off a jump, avoiding any extending with your legs to control your airtime. This stable position helps with a safer and easier first jump experience.
